messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: A wanted serial killer has been found in the boarding records of this station, so we are etrusting you to catch them before they commit another atrocity.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: THATS IT, ALL OF YOU STOP WHAT YOU'RE DOING! FROM THIS MOMENT WE ARE UNDER MARTIAL LAW.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Bow Solar Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Mike Town XIII. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attention Space station 13. we got our information wrong. Your station isn't the one with the possible murderer. It's the station nearby nearby. False alarm. CentComm Out.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Mike Town XIII door subroutines. Severity level of 1. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attention station, we have been checking sensors and cameras and the place seens to be a mess, soon power may run out again and the chaos will continue. Fix this mess or we will call the shuttle and fire everyone.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Sorry, this was meant for the soviet station, ignore it.
